<a id="VideoStreamPlayback"></a>

# VideoStreamPlayback

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Internal class used by [VideoStream](VideoStream.md) to manage playback state when played from a [VideoStreamPlayer](VideoStreamPlayer.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This class is intended to be overridden by video decoder extensions with custom implementations of [VideoStream](VideoStream.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_channels"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_channels**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_channels)

Returns the number of audio channels.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_length"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **_get_length**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_length)

Returns the video duration in seconds, if known, or 0 if unknown.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_mix_rate"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **_get_mix_rate**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_mix_rate)

Returns the audio sample rate used for mixing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_playback_position"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **_get_playback_position**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_playback_position)

Return the current playback timestamp. Called in response to the [VideoStreamPlayer.stream_position](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream_position) getter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **_get_texture**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_texture)

Allocates a [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) in which decoded video frames will be drawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_paused"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_paused**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_paused)

Returns the paused status, as set by [_set_paused()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__set_paused).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_is_playing**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing)

Returns the playback state, as determined by calls to [_play()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__play) and [_stop()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__stop).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__play"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_play**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__play)

Called in response to [VideoStreamPlayer.autoplay](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_autoplay) or [VideoStreamPlayer.play()](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_method_play). Note that manual playback may also invoke [_stop()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__stop) multiple times before this method is called. [_is_playing()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing) should return ``true`` once playing.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__seek"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_seek**\ (\ time\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__seek)

Seeks to `time` seconds. Called in response to the [VideoStreamPlayer.stream_position](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_stream_position) setter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__set_audio_track"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_audio_track**\ (\ idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__set_audio_track)

Select the audio track `idx`. Called when playback starts, and in response to the [VideoStreamPlayer.audio_track](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_audio_track) setter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__set_paused"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_paused**\ (\ paused\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__set_paused)

Set the paused status of video playback. [_is_paused()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_paused) must return `paused`. Called in response to the [VideoStreamPlayer.paused](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_property_paused) setter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__stop"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_stop**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__stop)

Stops playback. May be called multiple times before [_play()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__play), or in response to [VideoStreamPlayer.stop()](VideoStreamPlayer.md#VideoStreamPlayer_method_stop). [_is_playing()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing) should return ``false`` once stopped.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__update"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_update**\ (\ delta\: [float](float.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__update)

Ticks video playback for `delta` seconds. Called every frame as long as both [_is_paused()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_paused) and [_is_playing()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__is_playing) return ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VideoStreamPlayback_method_mix_audio"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **mix_audio**\ (\ num_frames\: [int](int.md), buffer\: [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) = PackedFloat32Array(), offset\: [int](int.md) = 0\ ) [ðŸ”—](#VideoStreamPlayback_method_mix_audio)

Render `num_frames` audio frames (of [_get_channels()](VideoStreamPlayback.md#VideoStreamPlayback_private_method__get_channels) floats each) from `buffer`, starting from index `offset` in the array. Returns the number of audio frames rendered, or -1 on error.
